TextBlock.Text: ALNUS: I maintain that the discussion of your idea did not require us to come... here.
ADONSONIA: Don't worry, as long as we're in the water we're fine. Which actually brings me to what I wanted to discuss; I think one of our requirements should be to have a dry seabed.
BETULA: It is true that many star systems have planets with exposed seabeds from years past. What made you think of it?
ADONSONIA: When I drained the water from WATER_PLANET_NAME to flood this cave, I saw how nice the seabed looks when exposed.
DAUCUS: Sounds easy enough. Should we go ahead and send that requirement to Oryza?
ALNUS: If it will get us out of this cave faster, then yes, certainly.
